name: auto-tab-groups
description: Cross-browser extension that automatically groups tabs by domain
author: Nitzan Papini

scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/public && cp src/public/*.html dist/public/ && cp src/public/*.css dist/public/ && cp -r src/assets dist/ && (cp src/sample-rules-import.json dist/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.build:chrome: npm run bundle && cp src/manifest.chrome.json dist/manifest.json && cd dist && zip -r ../auto-tab-groups-chrome.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' && echo 'Chrome extension built: auto-tab-groups-chrome.zip'
scripts.build:firefox: npm run bundle && cp src/manifest.firefox.json dist/manifest.json && cd dist && web-ext build --artifacts-dir ../web-ext-artifacts && cd .. && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && mv web-ext-artifacts/auto_tab_groups-*.zip web-ext-artifacts/auto-tab-groups-firefox-$VERSION.xpi && rm -f web-ext-artifacts/auto_tab_groups-*.zip && echo "Firefox extension built: auto-tab-groups-firefox-$VERSION.xpi"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.clean: rm -f *.zip *.xpi && rm -rf src/web-ext-artifacts && rm -rf dist && rm -rf web-ext-artifacts
scripts.dev:chrome: npm run bundle && cp src/manifest.chrome.json dist/manifest.json && echo 'Chrome development build ready - load dist/ folder in chrome://extensions/'
scripts.dev:firefox: npm run bundle && cp src/manifest.firefox.json dist/manifest.json && echo 'Firefox development build ready - load dist/ folder in about:debugging'
scripts.code:check: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.code:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
